<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viper Rapier](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2145)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from flawless jade, the guard of this [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36) takes the form of a twisting serpent with the blade thrusting from its open mouth. This rapier functions as a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [quickstrike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2844) rapier_. While wielding the rapier, your movement doesn't trigger reactions when you Stride, [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28), or [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29). When you invest the rapier, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail, but don't critically fail, an attack using the _viper rapier_;  **Effect** The tip of the rapier briefly takes the form of a viper's head, and the blade twists and contorts, biting the target you missed. The target is affected as if successfully poisoned with [cave worm venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3328) (DC 43).

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))  **Trigger** A creature misses or critically misses you with an attack;  **Effect** With a slight, obviously mocking bow or curtsy, you Step.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You twirl your rapier in a serpentine pattern, causing your form to become a blur of motion. You're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) for 1 minute or until you take a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300). While you're concealed, you also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saving throws.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Viper Rapier
